pageProps.title: Alternatives UK
pageProps.notes_data_entry: activities also include media. topics also include development, work, and many others (though spirituality and personal growth seem to be the main topics).

body.raw: Alternatives is an independent not-for-profit organisation dedicated to raising awareness and offering practical, inspiring and alternative solutions for every day living.
